name: script-sellers
description: - Open the _cmd_ and navigate to the folder of the project - Initialize a Node project by executing `npm init.` - Open the file _package.json_ and add this line under scripts: `"start": "node index"`   . - Add a comma at the end of the previous line - Now create a **_index.js_** file in your root directory - Require three modules: 	- html, fs and path - Make a new server object like we saw in class
